Steps: Enter a username. Use no more than 100 characters.
Enter a password that consists of 6-15 characters, at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit 0-9.

Title: Correct registration - using special characters

Enter a password that consists of 6-15 characters, at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit 0-9.

Title: Using an incorrect password - too few characters
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.
Steps: Enter a username. Use no more than 100 characters.
Enter a password with fewer than 6 characters, but including at least one uppercase, one lowercase.

Expected Result: You are informed that the password must consist of at least 6 characters.

Title: Using an incorrect password - too many characters
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.
Steps: Enter a username. Use no more than 100 characters.
Enter a password with more than than 15 characters, but including at least one uppercase, one lowercase.

Expected Result: You are informed that the password can't be longer than 15 characters.

Title: Using an incorrect password - lack of one digit
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.
Steps: Enter a username. Use no more than 100 characters.
Enter a password with 6-15 characters, including at least one uppercase, one lowercase, but excluding a digit.

Expected Result: You are informed that the password must consist of at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit.

Title: Using an incorrect password - lack of one lowercase
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.
Steps: Enter a username. Use no more than 100 characters.
Enter a password with 6-15 characters, including at least one uppercase, one digit, but excluding lowercase.

Expected Result: You are informed that the password must consist of at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit and one of the following special characters: !@#$%^&*

Title: Using an incorrect password - lack of one uppercase
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.

Enter a password with 6-15 characters, including at least one lowercase, one digit, but excluding uppercase.

Expected Result: You are informed that the password must consist of at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one digit.

Title: Using an incorrect password - using other characters
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.

Enter a password with 6-15 characters, including at least one lowercase, one digit, one uppercase, but use special characters other than !@#$%^&*

Expected Result: You are informed that the password must consist of at least uppercase, lowercase, digits and characters !@#$%^&*

Title: Using an incorrect password - using white-space characters
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.

Enter a password with 6-15 characters, including at least one lowercase, one digit, one uppercase, and use white-space character(s)

Expected Result: You are informed that the password must consist of at least uppercase, lowercase, digits and characters !@#$%^&*.

Title: Using an incorrect password - using other characters - Polish diacritics
